title: What’s Happening on Hospital Frontlines
itunes:title: What’s Happening on Hospital Frontlines
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, provides a coronavirus update and gives a firsthand look at what's happening on hospital frontlines. We get Businessweek Economics with Bloomberg Economics Chief Economist Tom Orlik. He discusses China's historic economic slump and hard recovery ahead. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Max Abelson talks about Cantor planning hundreds of jobs cuts, breaking with firms across Wall Street that vowed not to lay off employees.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
